Created an attachment (id=5443)
Notice the two markers in the text editor(red ones) and only one in the task
list

I restarted Eclipse and I saw something equally strange:

The markers where present in the task list, but there were no red markers on 
the left hand side in the text editor.

CDT 1.2.0.9(I wanted to upgrade, but the Install/Update perspective is busted 
in my Eclipse, a seperate problem I've reported).

?yvind
PR was targeted to the 2.0 release but not resolved, moving target to 2.1
I've never seen this, in the two and a half years this has been open. The traceback suggests that the Path to the working copy is null, which is unlikely.
